name: The King of Chicago
description:
The King of Chicago is an adventure, strategy and arcade game developed by Cinemaware and Master Designer Software. It came out on 01-01-1987. Cinemaware published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
The King of Chicago is available on iOS, Classic Macintosh, Commodore / Amiga and Atari ST. The game is sold via Google Play.
